name: Memory Dump
description:
Having lost himself in the endless grind of work, time seems a rare commodity. Help him find himself again in what matters, what needs to be dumped for more time. 

Gameplay:  Find lost keepsakes around his home within the allotted time and find nostalgic points to find information about them. What you keep and what you let go will affect how Ron goes about his life next.

Movement = Arrow Keys 

Proceed/Examine = Spacebar 

Keep items = K 

Dump items = D

Made for Mini Jam 126: Lost

Sounds and music from https://www.zapsplat.com

Fonts from Dafont.com (Pixelated Font, Diogenes, and Be You)
